Welcome to my research website.

This website documents the manual and example workflow of MeRIPtools.

To install the package:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("scottzijiezhang/MeRIPtools")
library("MeRIPtools")
```
